Text:
I can't thank you enough for doing these.  

Capt,  What capture program do you use?
You use cdex to capture internet radio streams?

...yes....under ''tools'' there is a selection for ''record from analog input''....there is also a timer built in...for 3 hour radio shows...it seems better to record to a wav file first, then convert later....

WoW!  You do this all manually?  I was using replay A/V where it would automatically record shows.  You just set day and time to record for a station.  But it seems harder and harder to find stations that work with it anymore...

i didn't know about the replay a/v...and it seems that it's been discontinued

http://www.google.com/search?q=replay+av+discontinued&ie=utf-8&oe=utf-8&aq=t&rls=org.mozilla:en-US:official&client=firefox-a

Well I'm still using it.  I record as many streams as I want at one time.  I records the streams without having to hear the sound.  I just figured out that I can use media catcher to find the url of the stream.  Now it seems to be working just fine.
